block-rm.name: Block RM Commands
block-rm.description: Prevents dangerous 'rm' commands that could delete files. Use file manager or specific operations instead.

block-git-stash.name: Block Git Stash
block-git-stash.description: Prevents git stash commands which can hide work. Encourages explicit commits instead.

protect-env-vars.name: Protect Environment Variables
protect-env-vars.description: Prevents modifications to critical environment variables like PATH, AWS credentials.

block-python-inline.name: Block Python -c
block-python-inline.description: Prevents inline Python execution (python -c). Create proper scripts in debugging_scripts/ instead.

block-error-hiding.name: Block Error Hiding
block-error-hiding.description: Prevents bash commands with error hiding (2>/dev/null, || true). Errors should be visible.

block-hook-editing.name: Block Hook Editing
block-hook-editing.description: Prevents AI from editing hook files. Hooks should be managed by humans.

block-sed-editing.name: Block Sed Editing
block-sed-editing.description: Prevents sed for editing. Use Edit tool instead for reviewable changes.

block-homedir-edits.name: Block Home Directory Edits
block-homedir-edits.description: Prevents editing files outside current project directory. Protects system files.

python-lint-before-run.name: Python Lint Before Run
python-lint-before-run.description: Auto-lints Python files before execution. Catches syntax errors early.

block-file-versions.name: Block File Versions
block-file-versions.description: Prevents creating versioned file copies (_v1, _v2). Use git instead.
